title: VR-Based English Vocabulary Acquisition Program Combining Reading and Listening

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary (2,000-word level) and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Job-linked English vocabulary enhancement program for working professionals

learning_goals: After 12 weeks of reading and simultaneous listening activities in a VR environment, learners can recognize pronunciations (sound recognition) of 200 target vocabulary words with 80% accuracy
Through 10 weeks of combined reading-listening learning, learners can select the meanings (meaning recognition) of target vocabulary with over 75% accuracy in formative assessments
By practicing situational dialogues in VR simulations, learners can generate sentences (meaning recall) utilizing target vocabulary meanings with over 70% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
